Widget.name: Document Download
Widget.Description: Displays a download link for the first entry of the given Feed.

Option.name: Widget title
Option.Description: Widget title. If blank, no name is displayed.

Option.name: Inlined download
Option.Description: Sets to "true" if it is intended to be displayed automatically by the browser.

Option.name: JSP path to use if no results
Option.Description: If there are no results, this widget is hidden using a Trigger or a message is displayed.
